name: The Art of Beadweaving by Jane Lock
description:
The definitive reference book for everything beadwork, offering a comprehensive collection of techniques both on- and off-loom.

Each of the techniques is illustrated with large how-to photographic steps and inspirational projects that use each technique. Also included are 5 beautiful projects by guest contributors Nancy Dale, Carol Dean Sharpe, Heather Collin, Glenda Mac Naughton and Kerrie Slade.

<b>Signed by the author.<b>
Published by Search Press 2013. Paperback. 160 pages. 


ISBN 978-0-85762-121-4

name: Chunky Paperchain Bracelet
description:
Let your wrist celebrate!
A bangle-style bracelet hand stitched from thousands of Japanese glass beads. Each loop is joined into the next to resemble a chunky, matte and shiny paper chain. 

Designed to fit a small wrist (6.75 inches).

UK p&p is free.

name: Paperchain Bracelet Jr
description:
A lighter weight version of the Chunky Paperchain Bracelet.

A bangle-style bracelet hand stitched from thousands of Japanese glass beads. Each loop is joined into the next to resemble a chunky, matte and shiny paper chain. 

Designed to fit a medium wrist (7 inches).

UK p&p is free.

name: Paperchain Ring
description:
Bold and beautiful hand stitched rings made from thousands of Japanese glass beads. A single loop decorated with a contrast strip of tiny beads. 

Neon Blue ring measures 64mm approx (US size 11, UK sizes U-V)
Neon Pink ring measures 60mm approx (US size 9,   UK sizes R-S)
Neon Lime ring measures 60mm approx (US size 9,   UK sizes R-S)
Matte Monochrome ring measures 64mm approx (US size 11, UK sizes U-V)

UK p&p is free.
